location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区金融大街30号
location.en: No. 30, Jinrong Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管外汇和国际收支工作的国务院部委管理的国家局，由中国人民银行管理。负责管理国家外汇收支、买卖、借贷、转移以及国际间的结算、外汇汇率和外汇市场。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) is an administrative agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, managed by the People's Bank of China. It is responsible for managing the country's foreign exchange activities, including balance of payments, buying and selling, lending, transfers, international settlements, exchange rates, and the foreign exchange market.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行，对国家外汇管理局进行管理。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China, which manages the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，国家外汇管理局是其下属的主管外汇工作的机构。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China, under which the State Administration of Foreign Exchange operates to manage foreign exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家大型国有商业银行。在国家外汇管理局成立初期，曾与其合署办公并同时承担外汇管理和经营职能。
description.en: A major state-owned commercial bank in China. In the early days of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, it shared offices and concurrently undertook both foreign exchange management and business functions.

description.zh-cn: 一种机构编制形式，指同一个机构在不同场合或因不同需要而使用不同名称，但实质上是同一组人员和职能。国家外汇管理局与中国银行在成立初期即为此种关系。
description.en: An organizational structure where a single institution uses different names for different occasions or needs, but essentially consists of the same staff and functions. This described the relationship between the State Administration of Foreign Exchange and the Bank of China in its early period.

nodes.id: 国务院部委管理的国家局

zh-cn: 国务院部委管理的国家局

description.zh-cn: 一种中华人民共和国国家级行政机构的类型，由国务院的组成部门或直属机构管理。国家外汇管理局属于此类机构。
description.en: A type of national administrative agency in the People's Republic of China that is managed by a constituent department or a directly subordinate agency of the State Council. The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is this type of agency.

nodes.id: 部委归口管理的国家局

zh-cn: 部委归口管理的国家局

description.zh-cn: 一种中华人民共和国国家级行政机构的类型，由国务院的特定部委进行业务指导和管理。国家外汇管理局属于此类机构。
description.en: A type of national administrative agency in the People's Republic of China that is under the professional guidance and administration of a specific ministry or commission of the State Council. The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is this type of agency.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个行政级别。国家外汇管理局的行政级别为副部级。
description.en: An administrative rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China. The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is at the vice-ministerial level.

nodes.id: 中国共产党国家外汇管理局党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党国家外汇管理局党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在国家外汇管理局设立的领导核心机构。
description.en: The core leadership body of the Communist Party of China established within the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

nodes.id: 中央纪委国家监委驻人民银行纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻人民银行纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央纪委和国家监委派驻中国人民银行的纪律检查和监察机构，负责对包括国家外汇管理局在内的机构进行监督。
description.en: The discipline inspection and supervision agency dispatched by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP and the National Supervisory Commission to the People's Bank of China, responsible for supervising institutions including the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，国家外汇管理局首任局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, the first Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国家外汇管理局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

description.en: Chinese economist and politician, former Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange and Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾两次担任国家外汇管理局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange on two separate occasions.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局是中华人民共和国国务院主管外汇和国际收支工作的机构。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is an agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign exchange and balance of payments.

description.zh-cn: 自1982年起，国家外汇管理局由中国人民银行领导和管理。
description.en: Since 1982, the State Administration of Foreign Exchange has been led and managed by the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 成立初期，国家外汇管理局与中国银行合署办公，属于“一个机构两块牌子”，由中国银行同时承担外汇管理职能。
description.en: In its early days, the State Administration of Foreign Exchange shared offices with the Bank of China under the 'one institution, two names' model, with the Bank of China concurrently undertaking foreign exchange management functions.

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局在成立初期采用了“一个机构两块牌子”的组织形式，与中国银行合署办公。
description.en: In its early period, the State Administration of Foreign Exchange adopted the 'one institution, two names' organizational model, sharing offices with the Bank of China.

relationships.target: 国务院部委管理的国家局

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局是国务院部委管理的国家局。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is a state bureau administered by a ministry or commission of the State Council.

relationships.target: 部委归口管理的国家局

description.zh-cn: 根据1988年8月13日的规定，国家外汇管理局是司局级的部委归口管理的国家局。
description.en: According to the regulations of August 13, 1988, the State Administration of Foreign Exchange is a bureau-level state agency administered by a relevant ministry.

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局的行政级别是副部级。
description.en: The administrative rank of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange is vice-ministerial level.

relationships.source: 中国共产党国家外汇管理局党组

description.zh-cn: 党组是中国共产党在国家外汇管理局设立的领导机构。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group is the leading body of the Communist Party of China established within the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.

relationships.target: 中央纪委国家监委驻人民银行纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局接受中央纪委国家监委驻人民银行纪检监察组的纪检监察。
description.en: The State Administration of Foreign Exchange is subject to the discipline inspection and supervision of the CCDI-NSC Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 朱鹤新兼任中国人民银行副行长与国家外汇管理局局长。
description.en: Zhu Hexin concurrently serves as Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China and Director of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.
